algorithm_technique: Bit manipulation to determine the character based on the binary representation of k-1.
problem_summary_simple: Find the k-th character in a string that grows by appending transformed versions of itself.
problem_summary_technical: The k-th character's position maps to the number of set bits in k-1, determining its transformation state.
key_insights: The string generation follows a pattern related to binary representations.
The number of set bits (popcount) in k-1 directly corresponds to the character's transformation.
The problem can be solved by observing the pattern of character generation and its relation to binary numbers.
